argument.name: path
argument.description: The directory of the project to add

command.name: commands
command.description: Displays a list of available commands.

command.name: create-dir
command.description: Creates a new directory at the provided path.

argument.name: path

command.description: Prints the path of the current working directory.

argument.name: command
argument.description: The command to display help information for

argument.name: path
argument.description: The directory in which to create the project

command.name: list-dir
command.description: Lists the files and subdirectories contained in the given directory.

argument.name: path
argument.description: The directory whose contents to list

option.name: sort-order
option.description: Sets the sort order for the output
